revised_title: Development of the Pancreas and Pancreatic Ducts in Trichosurus Vulpecula
tldr: The development of the pancreas and its ducts in the marsupial Trichosurus vulpecula is studied. The pancreas is derived from three distinct primordia, and the hepatic ducts and gall-bladder are also examined. The research provides detailed descriptions of the embryonic stages and the development of these structures.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
